text: I was at store today. Purchased a blood pressure machine. At the cashier, another customer behind me approached me to help add on her item on my card so that customer can pass her cash to counter. I was just being helpful by saying sure. However the attitude of the cashier Karen Yeo really shocked me, the full recipes with bonus she hide it (waiting for me to leave so she can pass all of it to the other customer) I continued to stand there & she had no choice but to pass me. She also told the other customer, it’s ok I will pass you more later. I’m not sure if this is some kind of internal scam going on or staff is just racist. I really hope the management will look at the cctv & review this case. I would want a formal explanation on this experience I have faced today.

I would like to express a heartfelt thanks to both Pharmacist Young and Jay whom went a extra mine for obtaining a prescription medication for me

( Young ) was not only doing his profession as a pharmacist at IMM branch he went an additional move to source for the a cream with recent batch recalled by HSA but he manage to get a older batch from searching on the back end inventory.He gave a called to Taman Jurong

Shawn working at Westgate unity pharmacy is extremely helpful and knowledgeable, spend almost an hours explaining  medication for my high blood and gout, he show passion and professionalism in his job. Thank you so much for the great advice you given me yesterday. Shawn. Keep it up.
A wide variety of supplements and other products
